short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add selected text to personal thoughtback.com log.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds context menu item to clip selected text & create new thought to your personal thoughtback.com log. Essentially a very unfancy webclipper.


New window will appear with free-form text field containing your text. 

I own nothing. Everything Copyright Thoughtback.com
